pa_breakdowns.description: In the main ServiceNow browser window (not Studio), use the All menu to open Performance Analytics > Breakdowns > Automated Breakdowns. Click the New button. Configure the breakdown. Name: NeedIt Requests by Month Halves Description: Breakdown for NeedIt requests to divide requests into the first and second halves of the month by When needed field value. Configure the Automated section (tab). Breakdown source: NeedIt Requests by Month Half Click the Additional actions menu ( The Additional actions menu is on the left side of the form header. ) and select the Save menu item. Scroll to the Breakdown Mappings related list and add the script to the breakdown mapping. Click the New button. Configure the Breakdown Mapping. Facts table: NeedIt [x_58872_needit_needit] Scripted: Selected (checked) Script: NeedIt.day Click the Submit button on the Breakdown Mapping form.
pa_breakdowns.name: NeedIt Requests by Month Halves
